title: Cold Email Generator
description: An automated tool that generates personalized cold emails based on job listings. It uses job descriptions to tailor the email content, helping users increase their chances of landing a job.

title: AI Hackathon - Ampera Insights
description: Won the Leipzig AI Hackathon by building a real-time, multi-sector funding intelligence platform with AI insights, dashboards, and automated reporting for public-sector decision-making (SAB).

title: Research Tool for News Insights
description: A tool designed to extract insights from articles in the stock market and financial domains. It uses LangChain and OpenAIâ€™s GPT-3 for article processing and insight generation.

title: Power BI Sales Dashboard
description: A dynamic sales dashboard built using Power BI, aimed at providing key insights into sales data, helping businesses track performance, and make data-driven decisions.

title: LinkedIn Post Generator
description: An AI-powered tool that replicates a LinkedIn user's writing style using few-shot prompting with LLaMA 3.3 70B. It extracts metadata from past posts and generates personalized new ones via a responsive Streamlit interface.

title: Demand Forecasting with Power BI and Machine Learning
description: A project focused on forecasting demand using historical sales data. Includes a Power BI dashboard for visualizing and predicting trends based on various input features.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with React, showcasing projects, skills, and professional experience. It features an interactive design and smooth transitions.
